data.name: Less or Equal
data.description:
# Your Task
You are given a vector of integers and integer number k. Find the lowest positive integer x (x>0) so that exactly k elements of given vector are less than or equal to x. 

### Note: 
* The vector can contain equal elements, All the element of the vectors are guaranteed to positive and k â‰¥ 0.
* Return -1 if the condition does not match.


# Example
```cpp 
int lessEqual({3, 7, 6, 1, 10, 3, 20}, 4) == 6;
int lessEqual({3, 7, 6, 1, 10, 3, 20}, 2) == -1;
int lessEqual({10, 15, 20, 25}, 0) == 1;
```
```javascript
lessEqual([3, 7, 6, 1, 10, 3, 20], 4) == 6
lessEqual([3, 7, 6, 1, 10, 3, 20], 2) == -1
lessEqual([10, 15, 20, 25], 0) == 1
```
```haskell
lessEqual([3, 7, 6, 1, 10, 3, 20], 4) == 6
lessEqual([3, 7, 6, 1, 10, 3, 20], 2) == -1
lessEqual([10, 15, 20, 25], 0) == 1
```
```python
less_equal([3, 7, 6, 1, 10, 3, 20], 4) == 6
less_equal([3, 7, 6, 1, 10, 3, 20], 2) == -1
less_equal([10, 15, 20, 25], 0) == 1
```
```ruby
less_equal([3, 7, 6, 1, 10, 3, 20], 4) == 6
less_equal([3, 7, 6, 1, 10, 3, 20], 2) == -1
less_equal([10, 15, 20, 25], 0) == 1
```
